name: Mary's Chicken and Black Bean Chili
author: imsuprmn
summary: Given to me by a close friend and is pretty much amazing. Even better heated up the next day.
ingredients: 1  green bell pepper, seeded and cut into squares
1  red bell pepper, seeded and cut into squares
3 (15 ounce) cans black beans, rinsed and drained
1  rotisserie chicken, meat removed and chopped
directions: Heat olive oil in Dutch oven or deep skillet over medium-high heat
Saute chopped onion, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, and garlic in hot oil until tender but not yet browned, 5 to 7 minutes
Pour chicken broth over the vegetable mixture; season with chili powder, cumin, salt, and black pepper
Place a lid on the pot, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer for 30 minutes
Stir black beans, stewed tomatoes, and chicken meat together in a separate pot over medium-low heat; bring to a low simmer
Stir the vegetable-broth mixture into the black bean mixture
Bring again to a simmer and cook, adding water as needed to keep the mixture from becoming too dry, until the flavors blend, at least 30 minutes
